Numera NUMERA "THINK FAST, TAP FASTER" START LEADERBOARDS HOW TO PLAY BACK
//how to play -Solve math problems by clicking the right tiles on the screen within the time limit -The game will stop if you click the wrong answer or the time limit is reached. -The game will progress faster when you a certain points is reached. -Easy 10 to 50 points, Medium 50 to 100 points and Hard is 100points to 200points. -Extreme level 200points to failure.
